text: فَعَتَوْا۟ عَنْ أَمْرِ رَبِّهِمْ فَأَخَذَتْهُمُ ٱلصَّـٰعِقَةُ وَهُمْ يَنظُرُونَ

translation.en.sahih: But they were insolent toward the command of their Lord, so the thunderbolt seized them while they were looking on.
translation.id.indonesian: Maka mereka berlaku angkuh terhadap perintah Tuhannya, lalu mereka disambar petir dan mereka melihatnya.
